data.name: MainScene.labelValueInfo.Text
data.value: description： XexDash is a game programme reading software, opereted on xbox360 development machines and its gaming consoles’ xbrboot system. updates :Better System Interface :More language options :Game's backgrounds, ID, names and ICO display :self-defining backgrounds :Memorize the chosen drive :FTP, XBLA
